Introduction

BDC, also known as Boys Da Capo, is a project unit consisting of Kim Si Hun, Hong Seong Jun, and Yun Jung Hwan under Brand New Music. The trio is best known for their appearance on the hit survival show Produce X 101.

They debuted on September 23, 2020 with the EP "The Intersection : Belief."

On August 17, 2023, Brand New Music confirmed that the group will release their final song on August 26, 2023, and then will disband after the termination of their contracts.
